Just for being a classic and so cheap you must play it. It opens the world for the far superior Half Life 2, but this one is a must to really understand how video games have come so far.

Playing this forces you to remember that they're turning the franchise into VR trash, cannot recommend, it's too painful.

Just finished the game and I can absolutely recommend it to others who haven't played it yet. The controlls are pretty clunky, especially movement, but you get used to it after a while, after all it's a 3d game from before the 2000's. It's got some nice story and it was longer than I expected, impressive how they managed to cram  15hrs of 3d content on anything portable back then; all in all Half-Life is old but gold 8/10

Holy shit boar alter. Blockbuster. wie im kinofilm. das war noch ein richtiges spiel. es macht 2020 noch spaÃŸ. man kann nicht aufhÃ¶ren. wirklich einmalig. und nur 500 mb. so ein titel vermisse ich in der heutigen zeit. ich habe in letzter zeit viele altere spiele gespielt aber dieses ist wirklich fesselnt. ich komme noch aus der zeit mit 75mhz rechner. dieser titel hat mich nochmal daran erinnert das es groÃŸe ausnahmen gibt die sich von anderen spielen unterscheiden. ich hoffe es kommt nochmal so ein titel weil ich mittlerweile gaming mÃ¼de geworden bin. neue spiele machen schon fast kein spaÃŸ mehr da die leute es einfach nicht mehr drauf haben. :D

For a game from 1998, it still rocks. It's actually kind of surprising how after these many years, I still come back and play it again. Multiplayer is still active, but get ready to get gaussed.

Classic game. Brings back some childhood memories. A must get game!

It was alright. As someone who's new to Half Life/GoldSRC/Source games, it was a bit of a challenge, but interesting and definitely worth playing. I highly recommend anyone who hasn't picked it up in the past to pick it up and play it while it is still free.
